posts.content:
Hi guys, I'm looking at different interiors to decide what to do with my bus. I have found this interior which I really like the look of, the bed extends over the bay, what is this called? Flickr link below to a photo of it

http://www.flickr.com/photos/85376002@N02/7823164612

author.location: Sunny Jersey in the Channel Islands

posts.content:
The interior itself looks custom built rather than a factory conversion. The bed mechanism is the standard 3/4 width rock and roll bed mechanism, you can buy the hinges or the complete units from most well known VW places.

Cheers

Dr. G.
Cheers guys, it's mainly the bed I'm interested in, I've been looking at campers for some time but still havent got the hang of all the lingo.
